DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Optional configuration nodes for the Solr server

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Sets the Solr home folder (without trailing /). By default this is {webapp home}/WEB-INF/solr.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The name of the Solr configuration file. The default file name is solr.xml. It's URL will be concatenated as {home folder}/{file name}.
